edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom

Class VariableAssignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<Variable,GroundTerm>
        • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom.VariableAssignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<Variable,GroundTerm>

    public class VariableAssignment
extends java.util.HashMap<Variable,GroundTerm>
    Maintains a mapping from Variables to GroundTerms, i.e. a variable substitution. Used to maintain a grounding of a Formula.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

      • copyAssign

        public VariableAssignment copyAssign(Variable var,
                            GroundTerm arg)
        Assigns the given variable/ground term pair to a copy of this variable assignment.
        Parameters:
        var - A variable
        arg - A ground term
        Returns:
